body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack  install  intel@19.0.4
```

### Platform and user environment

Current SPACK (devel) from today (cfbdd21)
```
Linux login 3.10.0-957.12.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue May 14 21:24:32 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810
```

### Additional information

The Intel compiler got installed into .../opt/linux-centos7-**broadwell**/gcc-.../intel-19.0.4-...
As the Intel compiler is just a binary blob I do not see any use of putting it into a directory of a specific architecture instead of linux-centos7-**x86_64**
title: Intel compiler gets installed to linux-$os-$microarch instead of linux-$os-x86_64
